title: Azir Skin Request Pretty Please
body:
Hi all at Riot and in general 

Just wanted to suggest a skin idea (or second it if requested before) for a 'Necromancer Azir'. 

He could summon skeleton warriors instead of sand soldiers, and have dark, grey / crimson robes sort of thing 

Or Shadow Soldiers like Zed's dash - And he could be 'Shadow Master Azir' 

He needs another skin please (as cool as the stargate Galactic one is :) 

Thank you!

Kaiser

replies.body: I quite like this idea. It would be a very cool skin to come out for Harrowing.
